item.title: Cycle.js tutorial: Create a simple registration form and track the application state
item.description: Create a simple registration form using Cycle.js and track the application state This tutorial is the first in a series where we will be building a simple registration form using Cycle.js and we will be tracking the application state on what the user input is. Table of Contents 1. Create a simple registration form using Cycle.js and track the application state 1.1. About Cycle.js 1.2. Create the application boilerplate 1.
